title: Remove platform branding from shared footer

requirements.summary: Update the shared Layout footer to remove all platform branding and render only the required copyright line.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/App.tsx Layout footer, the rendered footer contains no references to "caffeine", "caffeine.ai", "Built with", or any outbound link to caffeine.ai.
The footer renders exactly: "© 2026 SankalpHub Solutions. All rights reserved." (including the year 2026, and the company name "SankalpHub Solutions").
No other footer elements (e.g., footer navigation links) are rendered; the footer is a single clean line of text.
The change applies consistently across all routes/pages since the footer is part of the shared Layout.

file_operations.description: In the Layout component, replace the current footer markup (including footerLinks navigation and the "Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai" text/link) with a single clean line of text that renders exactly: "© 2026 SankalpHub Solutions. All rights reserved." Ensure there are no remaining references to caffeine/caffeine.ai and no other footer elements are rendered.
